p: Lianhua Qingwen capsules contain many Chinese herbal ingredients with antiviral effects, such as licorice. Glycyrrhizic acid, an extract of licorice, has been shown to inhibit virus replication and has been used clinically to treat HCV infection [ 71]. Glycyrrhizic acid has been reported to inhibit the replication of SARS-CoV in vitro [ 72]. For the reasons above, Lianhua Qingwen capsules have been used in the clinic and have a certain effect on improving clinical symptoms because they can obviously alleviate the symptoms of cough, fever, and fatigue in patients with COVID-19, reduce the proportion of severe cases, and shorten fever time [ 73â€“ 75].
